GSD.description:
ppp: associate skb with a device at tx

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 148dcbd3af039ae39c3af697a3183008c7995805. For more details please see the references link.
